General.Name: Ellomay Capital Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Ellomay Capital Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the initiation, development, construction, and production of renewable and clean energy projects in Europe, USA, and Israel. The company owns photovoltaic (PV) plants comprising five PV plants in Spain. It also operates a dual-fuel operated power plant in the vicinity of Ashkelon, Israel; and constructs hydro power plant in the Manara Cliff, Israel. In addition, the company operates anaerobic digestion plants. The company was formerly known as NUR Macroprinters Ltd. and changed its name to Ellomay Capital Ltd. in April 2008. Ellomay Capital Ltd. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

3.Name: Mr. Yehuda  Saban
3.Title: Director of Operations for Israel & EVP of Business Development
